meanings.sent1: The flowers bloomed abundantly in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She ate the delicious cake abundantly.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels stored nuts abundantly for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness flowed abundantly towards everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The sun shone abundantly, warming the earth.

meanings.definition: To a great degree; very much.
meanings.sent1: He appreciates her abundantly for all her help.
meanings.sent2: They laughed abundantly at the funny movie.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail abundantly when it saw its owner.
meanings.sent4: The students thanked their teacher abundantly for the extra help.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed abundantly after the heavy rain.
